# WhatsApp Chat Viewer - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
A comprehensive Python application for viewing and analyzing WhatsApp chat exports with advanced filtering and manipulation capabilities.

## Features
- Import WhatsApp chat exports (without media)
- Calendar-based date filtering
- Time-based message analysis
- Message search and filtering
- Export filtered results
- Modern UI/UX with customtkinter
